column4: I'm trying to upgrade from 8.1 to jaunty and I have the .iso mounted to cdrom0 but it keeps saying it "can't find the autorun program".  I tried the commands here ( http://www.ubuntu.com/getubuntu/upgrading ) and they did nothing
you can upgrade if you're online already, you don't have to use the ISO
my internet on that comp is all messed up... it refuses to work with my internet line, just wi-fi from across teh street
run that from the terminal without quotes
